## GitDocumentDB.open property

Create a repository or open an existing one. If localDir does not exist, it is created.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
open: () => Promise<{
        isNew: boolean;
        isCreatedByGitDDB: boolean;
        isValidVersion: boolean;
    }>;
```
